<title level="1" right="Skill " pfs="">[Trade](/Skills.aspx?ID=31)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 529</row>

Trade measures a kingdom’s involvement in commerce of every kind, but especially in moving goods from one place to another and in the health of its market. You take a cumulative –1 item penalty on Trade checks for each settlement in your kingdom that has no Land Borders, unless it has at least one Water Border with a Bridge.

<title level="2">Trade Untrained General Actions</title>

- [Establish Trade Agreement](/Skills.aspx?ID=13&General=true) 

- [Focused Attention](/Skills.aspx?ID=14&General=true) 

- [Rest and Relax](/Skills.aspx?ID=19&General=true)

- [Repair Reputation](/Skills.aspx?ID=18&General=true)
